cleaned_text: Seeking traditional Naturopathic care and Doctors? Family members of all ages have been coming to the Windrose Naturopathic Clinic for over 50 years! We are Primary Care doctors in Washington. If you are not getting better under the "pharmaceutical" medical model of today, come see one of our doctors at Windrose Clinic. Daily, people with all kinds of issues, illnesses, & conditions come through our doors to get results. More often than not, those who come see us are tired of today's pharmaceutical model of treating illness. As the oldest continually operating Naturopathic clinic in the U.S., many, many, people have come before you with similar complaints. Here, they received a proper diagnosis and treatment. Naturopathic medicine is based on proven results that the human body has an innate healing ability. As Naturopathic doctors, we employ diet, exercise, lifestyle changes, together with cutting-edge natural therapies to enhance your ability to ward off and combat disease. We view the "whole you" as a complex, interrelated system, not as a clogged artery or a tumor. As Naturopathic physicians, we craft a comprehensive treatment plan, individually tailored for you, that blends the best of modern medical science and traditional natural medical approaches to not only treat disease but also restore you to optimal health. Our doctors here at the Windrose Naturopathic Clinic combine the wisdom of nature with the rigors of modern science. Steeped in traditional healing methods, principles, and practices, we focus on holistic, proactive prevention and comprehensive diagnosis and treatment. By using protocols that minimize the risk of harm, we will help facilitate the body's inherent ability to restore and maintain good health. It is our role to identify and remove barriers to good health by helping you create a holistic healing environment for yourself. We treat all medical conditions and can provide both individual and family health care. Among the most common ailments we treat are allergies, chronic pain, digestive issues, hormonal imbalances, obesity, respiratory conditions, heart disease, fertility problems, menopause, adrenal fatigue, cancer, fibromyalgia, and chronic fatigue syndrome. We can assist you in achieving proper hormonal balances, (both men and women) with bioidentical hormone therapies and other treatment plans. Click on the [Services](./services) link on top or bottom to see the depth of diagnostic techniques as well as the therapeutic techniques we employ at the Windrose Naturopathic Clinic. Wow. You really read all the way to the bottom of my web page? You must also be one of those rare persons who stay in a movie theater to watch all the movie credits, hoping to see some out-take clips at the end. Well, it's like that here at the web page end. I am currently President of a very important professional organization - perhaps the most important professional organization that exists in the world right now - The Naturopathic Medicine Institute (NMI). It is a 501-C3 nonprofit organization whose purpose is to nurture, expand and teach the fundamentals of Naturopathic medicine to recent graduates of Naturopathic medical schools, and to educate the general public as to the possibilities of Naturopathic medicine. I owe a great deal to this organization and am excited to help it grow.
